posts.post_content:
$400/shipped

Up for sale is a lot of 51 T206 cards.  The overall grade is poor, with a few fair cards as well.  Various backs included such as Cycle, Sovereign, Polar Bear, plenty of Piedmonts and Sweet Caps, but nothing major.  All cards have a slight wave-like warp when viewed in profile.  Nothing major, but it is there.

All front and back scans can be found here:

[url]http://chasingthemonster.com/t206.html[/url]

Prefer to sell as a lot only.  PayPal preferred. 

Thanks for looking!
